mapper.sql: id, groupId, sourceId, sourceCode, fileName, fileSize, fileType, fileUrl, fileId, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE bas_atts
groupId = #{map.groupId},
sourceId = #{map.sourceId},
sourceCode = #{map.sourceCode},
fileName = #{map.fileName},
fileSize = #{map.fileSize},
fileType = #{map.fileType},
fileUrl = #{map.fileUrl},
fileId = #{map.fileId},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bas_atts
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND groupId like CONCAT('%', #{groupId} , '%')
AND sourceId like CONCAT('%', #{sourceId} , '%')
AND sourceCode like CONCAT('%', #{sourceCode} , '%')
AND fileName like CONCAT('%', #{fileName} , '%')
AND fileSize like CONCAT('%', #{fileSize} , '%')
AND fileType like CONCAT('%', #{fileType} , '%')
AND fileUrl like CONCAT('%', #{fileUrl} , '%')
AND fileId like CONCAT('%', #{fileId} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
